sentence.Network_en: They usually write poetry in heroic couplets , a polished iambic pentameter line.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们通常以英雄双行体创作诗歌, 这是一种经过推敲的五步抑扬格诗行.

sentence.Network_en: A couplet written in iambic pentameter is called a heroic couplet.
sentence.Network_cn: 五步抑扬格的双韵体称英雄双韵体.

sentence.Network_en: In English, the meter most commonly used with blank verse has been iambic pentameter.
sentence.Network_cn: 英语中, 无韵诗最常用的格律是抑扬格五音步(因此无韵诗又被称为无韵五节拍诗).

list.abs: 此诗的基本音步类型是抑扬格，每行五音步。因此称此诗的格律是“抑扬格五音步”（iambic pentameter）。一首诗的音步类型和所含的音步数目构成此诗的格律（meter）。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French iambique, via late Latin from Greek iambikos, from iambos (see iambus)
